Name: Cobertura
Version: 1.9
Description: Library for measuring and reporting code coverage of tests.
License: cobertura
OSR: 10710
Origin: http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/cobertura/cobertura-1.9-bin.zip?download
Files: cobertura-1.9.jar
Source: http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/cobertura/cobertura-1.9-src.zip?download
Comment: See issue 145107
